data.title: Entebbe Safari & Custom Uganda Tours
data.meta_description: Read our travel guide on Entebbe Safari in Uganda and things to do in Entebbe. Plan your private and tailor-made Uganda tour with advice from our experts.
data.text:
This Uganda safari tour takes you deep into the heart of the wilderness for fantastic wildlife encounters. Your journey begins in Entebbe, set on the shores of the mighty Lake Victoria, the world’s largest tropical lake. In Kibale, heart-stopping moments are guaranteed as you track Uganda’s famed chimpanzees through the dense forest with an experienced…

This private Uganda gorilla trekking tour promises you a heart-stopping, adrenaline-pumping adventure in the misty mountains of this African nation. Your vacation begins in the town of Entebbe, on the shores of the colossal Lake Victoria, which is one of the largest lakes in Africa by area. Explore the peaceful beaches and botanical gardens in…

This private Kenya and Uganda safari tour is a great way to discover Africa’s diverse wildlife. The adventure begins at Ol Pejeta Private Game Reserve, one of the largest rhino sanctuaries in East Africa, where you can enjoy game drives and sundowners everyday. Classic Africa awaits you in the iconic golden grasslands of Masai Mara,…

Entebbe Airport Guest House comprises 6 rooms with big double beds and 2 rooms with two single beds in each (twin room).

No. 5 Boutique Hotel, located just a 15 minute drive away from the airport, offers you a wonderfully tranquil stay at Entebbe. Walk into an upscale boutique hotel tucked into a quiet suburb, with gorgeous gardens and landscaped grounds.
